website_summaries.verdict: Although you don't get a price break by buying the package instead of the individual devices, we still consider this one of the best mouse and keyboard packages on the market. It combines an even better version of our favorite mouse and an equally adept keyboard at a very reasonable price.
pros: rechargeable mouse only available in this package
cons: No discount on the bundle versus buying each device separately

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product and worse customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I used to by all my computer accessories from Logitech, so when I needed a new keyboard and mouse I bout this. this combo worked for 3 month, and it stopped, I contacted Logitech and they sent me a replacement witch only worked for about 5 month, so I contacted Logitech again, and they refused to replace it again because they said that this is not the original product I purchased, and I do not have a receipt for it. I am very disappointed at Logitech, they used to have great products and customer service, now they lost both, and lost me as a customer as well.
customer_reviews.author: ajamal

customer_reviews.title: Going back to corded setup...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: wasn't DOA Cons: Mouse stutters and freezes. ANYONE experiencing this will go batty. Keyboard ocassionaly lags and drops characters. I hate anticipating what will come out on the screen after 5~10 seconds. BTW, before anyone says, "get an extension cord for the dongle", I paid $114 for this keyboard/mouse combo to replace a PERFECTLY good corded setup, IT SHOULD WORK and last more than 2 years. The keyboard and dongle are 4 feet away. Besides, I suspect the USB transceiver is malfunctioning as it was working up until a month ago. I also have the "el cheapo" Logitech EX110 cordless keyboard/mouse combo and this thing works through walls (server...) and up to 10 feet away without issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great 99% of the Time
customer_reviews.text: This set worked perfectly on my XP computer. When I switched to Windows7, I began to have some issues. 99% of the time it is rock solid and the best wireless set I have ever used. But for about 5 minutes per day it can be the most frustrating keyboard you have ever typed on. It seems to go through a fit once a day for a few minutes where everything you type stutters and lags or adds extra letters and it is downright unusable during that short stretch. Logitech won't acknowledge the issue even though forums across the internet prove it is a wide spread issue that no one knows how to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The Wave
customer_reviews.text: This wireless keyboard/mouse combo has been excellent and I love it. Immediate install with no problems in Windows 7. All buttons/features work automatically without any problems. Adjusting mouse sensitivity is easy. The only problem I've had is the USB connector that receives the signal needs to be in plain sight, which is a pain. Initially, I plugged the USB connector into the back of the CPU, but the mouse was extremely sluggish. I then moved it to one of the front USB ports and it was better, I don't like the USB connector sticking out of the front USB ports, so I'm unhappy about that for aesthetic reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzle

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, so so mouse
customer_reviews.text: The Wave keyboard is one of the most comfortable I have used. The keys has just the right tactile feel and key travel. The palm rest is very comfortable and I liked the soft feel. The mouse that came with the keyboard (MX1100) is larger and more curved (as compared to the MX Revolution, my current mouse). Maybe because the MX Revolution is so comfortable, the MX1100 actually caused a cramp after mousing around for a few minutes. I wish Logitech would make a Wave keyboard and MX Revolution combo so that I do not need to use two differed RF receivers and free up one USB socket.
customer_reviews.author: T. Law

customer_reviews.title: Great Logitech Wireless Keyboard and Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews on a great many wireless keyboards and mice and decided on the Wave 2.4. I found it easy to set up and comfortable to use. I had had a Microsoft wireless keyboard and mouse but the mouse went bad and when I priced the wireless mice I found it more cost effective to get another keyboard and mouse combo. I wanted a change from the Microsoft and I'm glad I went with the Logitech. If there is one downside, I prefer to change a battery rather then plugging the mouse into the computer for it to charge. But it's really not a big deal. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Semegran

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro
customer_reviews.text: I've had it now for 3 months and there is yet something to find fault with. I'm not looking for one, but products I've bought in the past always had something that came up shortly after I plugged it in and started using it - not so with this package (mouse & keyboard). The recharability feature of the mouse is just a little thing, but all so welcome! I can work just about all day and never have to change the batteries then try to figure out how to get it working again without having to shut down and turn on again! I'd buy this again and recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Computer Tech

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard, big mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more than two years ago for $79 so I'm astounded at its current $185 price! Wow. It is a good product, though. The keyboard is very comfortable to type on and I haven't noticed any latency due to the wireless. I'm still using the original battery, so battery life is just amazing. My only complaint is that there is no caps-lock indicator. The mouse performs well, but it is very tall. For people with big hands that shape may be comfortable, but it made my hand ache after using it for a short time. I had to switch to a mouse with a flatter profile.
customer_reviews.author: readerwriter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: at first I had trouble with some of the key placements but now I love this keyboard. Action is great programable keys are really nice overall the keyboard is comfortable and strain free. The mouse is fantastic can't say enough for the mouse (I use a CAD program)... feels great in your hand and very responsive. you can connect to any computer simply by plugging in the USB stick For awhile I had to go back and forth between 2 computers very easy to do. The battery's can be recharged with the small adapter very efficient no wires etc Logitech really outdid themselves on this group. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fran W

customer_reviews.title: The best combination
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this keyboard and mouse combo for 3 weeks now and I have to admit that I'm not sure how I lived without it. OK... that might be a little bit over the top but it really is an excellent combination. I wish that I could bring it into the office and use it there also. The keyboard and mouse were simple to setup and the comfort level is incredible. I love how responsive the mouse is and the tactile feel of the keyboard is top notch. I've only been working with computers since 1983 but I really don't see why it took so long to create such a fine work of art and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Logitech for excellent product
customer_reviews.text: After struggle for many years with keyboard with cord, I decided to "cut this umbilical cord" what connected my old keyboard with my new PC. I decided to purchase Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Ergonomic Keyboard and Mouse from amazon.com . Do I regret my decision?. Yes. My only regret is: why I was waiting that long?. I'm extremely satisfied choosing this product. This keyboard & mouse combo is superb, I love it. Thank you Logitech for excellent product and amazon.com for good price. Best regards Ryszard Sytnik
customer_reviews.author: Ryszard Sytnik

customer_reviews.title: Great condition!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the condition of this "Refurbished" keyboard and mouse. So far it works great!
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard/mouse combo
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this keyboard/mouse combo with a Windows 7 64-bit laptop, and I love it. It's comfortable, and it's fairly quiet. I got it on sale for $65, and I think $100 is a little expensive for what it is, but overall it works really well. On the negative side, there is no software to customize it for a Mac. The volume controls work, but you can't reprogram any of the mouse or keyboard buttons. If you're okay with the defaults, then great. If not, I'd recommend a different combo that includes Mac software.
customer_reviews.author: Schuetzler

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were not what I was looking for and I almost passed on this product. Logitech offered a $30 rebate before Christmas and I decided to go for it. I am delighted. The keyboard is terrific and comfortable to use. The mouse has a nice heft to it and it's comfortable to use. My only fault with it is the thumb button for cascading tiles is so sensitive I press it by accident. I'll get used to that in time. I love this product. It's quality and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at home for my laptop. I connect the HDMI to my laptop and 42 inch HD tv, setup keyboard and mouse, crawl in bed with lots of pillows and I"M a Gaming in comfort. The keyboard would be nicer backlit but i know would use too much juice so guess cant have everything. The mouse is a dream. love all the controls and management for them. I use a different mouse when i'm on the go also by Logtech but still like wave pro set better.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Great but for booting up
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard but for some reason, I can't install the USB device until after booting or the keyboard and mouse don't get recognized and the PC won't boot. If I insert when Windows says it can't find a mouse or keyboard, it then finds the devices and the unit works great. Have worked with Logitech and INTEL (motherboard) to try to identify the problem but nothing has worked yet. All bios have been checked or updated as well.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Working pretty well 2 years on, just one nuisance issue
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use, as I have done on multiple computers now. The only real problem is an occasional delay between typing keys into the keyboard and their appearance on the screen. Sometimes this is accompanied by double-typing of some letters or some letters skipped. Try maintaining a direct line of sight between the keyboard and the USB transceiver. It seems to help somewhat, though it may be my imagination.
customer_reviews.author: David Grant

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Logitech for years. My previous wireless mouse/keyboard worked flawlessly for 5 years. I had been eyeing this combo for a long time. When I saw it at Amazon for 59.00 delivered, I had to pull the trigger. The wave pro combo makes working at my computer all day long enjoyable. It just feels right. The keys are well spaced and quiet so I can talk and type at the same time. The Mouse is functional and very ergonomic. The rapid scroll function is awesome as I have to sift through hundreds of emails at a time. Everything about it is great and I recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kusner

customer_reviews.title: The best mouse ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: So the keyboard is great, easy to use, comfortable, yada yada yada. However, what makes this set rate so high is the mouse. First of all, I love that it has a rechargeable battery. I have had a wireless mouse before, and end up changing the batteries every month or two, so this feature is a savings in itself. Plus, the mouse has several cool features. My favorite is the back/forward buttons on the side that make it really easy to navigate through folders and websites. It also has a scroll wheel that can be "unlocked" to allow for more rapid scrolling. I got it on sale, but definitely worth full price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Logitech sells item with known defect...
customer_reviews.text: Mouse was erratic, jerky movements and stopped randomly when it should have continued moving - frustrating. Called Logitech tech support for assistance, tech stated that this was a known defect and they would send another. It has not arrived yet... Keyboard seems to ^&^^^^^%&(*^ahsp. Bad joke, work just fine. Hope replacement mouse works as well as the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard/mouse combo
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard and mouse. Have been using it since October 2010. Has been used 8-10 hours per day, 4-5 days per week. Used for a job that requires a significant amount of keyboarding. Very comfortable. Both work well. Good battery life. Much better than the junk keyboard and mouse provided by my employer. Fewer typos and much less hand and finger soreness.
customer_reviews.author: gllags

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as i hoped it would. i bought it for when i use my tv as a monitor and dont sit at my desk. i sit at least 10 ft from my computer and have no signal strength issues while doing so. The keyboard shortcuts are an amazing convenience, and the customizable buttons on the mouse are great. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a wireless keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Too good, my wife now wants one
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about a "wave" type keyboard, but decided to give it a try--more to obtain the rechargeable mouse than anything else. Well, the mouse is great (although unlike the directions stated in the box it did require a recharge before first use) and the keyboard is so good that after giving it a try, my wife insisted that I order a second one for her. Doubts about the wave just vanished when I put it to use. I would certainly give this item a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro
customer_reviews.text: Almost a perfect system. But, there is one problem. Even though the receiver is only 3 feet away from the mouse and keyboard, sometimes there is a delay from the moment I press a key or move the mouse until I see the results on the screen. Other than that, this is a great desktop duo. Has great features and is well constructed. NOTE: The problem occurs about 1% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life. Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This beauty has been a dream. The mouse is rechargeable, but I almost forget that because I so rarely have to recharge it. The batteries in the keyboard I've only needed to replace once in nearly two years. It's easy to use and has never needed "reset" ---it's been one of those rare "it just works" kind of products. I'm so thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Happy user
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my Microsoft wireless keyboard/mouse with this one based on positive reviews here. I had to adapt a bit from the split keyboard I was used to, but am happy overall with this setup. The only thing I don't care for is the USB connection. I think it may be USB micro or some such thing. But the mouse keeps a charge for a very long time, so it isn't an issue often.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: nice set but serious issues.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard and mouse. Comfortable and installed instantly with Windows 7 Ultimate x64. DPI adjust on mouse is very convenient. Keyboard keys are pretty quiet (definitely not a silent key however) and overall comfortable to use. Only 3 stars because it lasted about 3 months until volume keys stopped working, along with Enter and Esc (no spills, drops, etc.) I'm a computer technician, and after troubleshooting for a few days I determined it was just a bad board. I decided to buy this set [...] to replace the keyboard. So far everything is working great, I'll update in 3 months if theres an issue.
customer_reviews.author: david m

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so far. It was easy to install, I like the ability to recharge the mouse battery without having to use disposable batteries and it is very comfortable for typing. I was considering the solar powered wireless keyboard as I like the idea of not using disposable batteries. Unfortunately, I found the lack of available space to rest my wrists was annoying. This keyboard has a light pad that is very comfortable. I am interested to see how the keyboard lasts. I tend to drop them or drop things on them. I also get food between the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Katawicz

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wave Pro Keyboard & MX 1100 Cordless Laser Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I did not give these items 5 stars because the mouse went south a week after I received it. Thankfully Amazon quickly replaced the set. I would say both items are the best thought out keyboard and mouse I have ever used. There are more then enough bells and whistles to keep most of us happy. I do not hesitate in recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Terry M. Wright Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Very good combo
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good keyboard and mouse button I don't think the price matches the quality and performance, the keys are too deep for my liking and they don't feel smooth. Somehong to do with the resistance Of the keys I feel more prone to have typos. I bought this item as a rebate so I didn't pay full price for it so I am going to give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Noah Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard set
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally satisfied with this wireless keyboard and mouse. The mouse shape took a little getting used to, and the action on the keyboard was a little odd until I'd used it for a couple days. But I've been using it daily for months now and I'm totally satisfied with it. The mouse lasts quite a while before having to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic!
customer_reviews.text: I work on the computer all day long and I need a keyboard/mouse combo that is comfortable and functional. This combo fills my requirements perfectly. The mail in rebate was sweet. Also, the amount of power these peripherals draw is so low I have barely had to change out the batteries over the past 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: wakak

customer_reviews.title: Awsome from accross the room
customer_reviews.text: I got this keyboard mainly to replace my broken keyboard but the uses became aparent after some playing around and is pure awsome. I set up the mouse to use media controls, and I can sit in front of my big screen and search the web, use word, watch movies, and of course play games. I suggest this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Redmond

customer_reviews.title: good keyboard great mouse
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wireless combo. The connectivity is almost perfect with only the rare drop-out or "stutter". The mx1100 mouse is wonderful! the dpi switch is useful as is the 3d windows flip. The keyboard is comfortable. The rechargeable mouse lasts about 2 weeks between charges. The keyboard is still on the set of batteries it came with a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Banshee
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favour, don't hesitate, BUY THIS! Best keyboard and mouse period! Quiet keyss, simple setup, rechargeable mouse, ( the only way to get the rechargeable mouse, is to buy the Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro) It is well worth it. LOGITECH BESTED themselves with this one, great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Banshee

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard & Mouse Combo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in an effort to protect my wrists. Years of typing are beginning to take their toll. The keyboard takes a little getting used to, however, within a few hours you would not go back to a regular keybaord. The Mouse does a fine job also. I love the free rolling wheel. It makes going through many pages a much quicker process.
customer_reviews.author: Ins Agent

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the lag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this keyboard and mouse for over a year. Like another review said my steel computer case must be throwing off the signal from the receiver. The keyboard often lags, a lot. The mouse on the other hand isn't that bad. Another thing is that distance I can go before it becomes totally useless is about 8 feet. Maybe I just got a faulty device. And this is definitely not worth the $200+ price tag. I got it for about $65 which is worth the price. For over $200 you can get something way better.
customer_reviews.author: chaotiksmurf

customer_reviews.title: Love this Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I had an ergonomic keyboard for an older Windows version. When my old computer did the inevitible crash and burn, I purchased a new HP to replace my dead Dell. Unfortunately, my Microsoft ergo keyboard only went up to Win XP and I now have Win 7. I have an autoimmune disease which makes typing very tiring and painful. This keyboard and mouse are wonderful and for the first time, the "F" keys work! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new keyboard at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Pam of WNC

customer_reviews.title: Best I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Still using it. Best I ever had. Hope new replacements are available when this set finally do give out. Can not remember how much I paid for the set but I sure was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Kenny

customer_reviews.title: -Logitech wave pro review
customer_reviews.text: I have an issue having the wireless connection always reading the connector. I sometimes find myself typing and the letters are not being transposed because of the loss of connection (I have found this with most wireless keyboards). I have not been able to get a good download on the CD that was included and I constantly get a pop-up stating that the program was not loaded correctly (I have not taken the time to determine if I could download from the web and not use the disk). All in all I am happy with the purchase and would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good duo
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Logitech Crodless Desktop Wave Pro. Both perform above expectations. Only wish that the keyboard had more programmable buttons that did not require the use of the function key.
customer_reviews.author: Owen McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro is a good buy - definitely worth the price. The keyboard functions quietly and is easy on the fingers. What I particularly like about this product is the mouse. Very precise and easy to navigate the files with. I would definitely recommend the keyboard-mouse combo to all who are looking for good and lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Amin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it since last 2 weeks and it works as advertised and it's awesome. I bought this to compliment my 52" Full HD Screen connected to my HDX 16t Laptop. Even with distance of 15 feet, it's working great. Would recommend this to anyone willing to enjoy remote/wirefree big Screen PC access. Both keyboard and Mouse are awesome and there were ZERO setup issues.
customer_reviews.author: customerfromindia

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: This one lasted for a long time!! Love Logitech products. Even sold it as used and the new owners love it too. Just wanted a more flat, smaller one so that's the only reason I got rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: OBXGirl79

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Dongle Stinks
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME Mouse. Best I've ever had. Keyboard is nice but I regret getting such a gigantic keyboard. The dongle is crud. I lose connection to my PC constantly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quick Deliver and Still working
customer_reviews.text: Quick Deliver and works like a charm thanks.Quick Deliver and works like a charm thanks.Quick Deliver and works like a charm thanks.Quick Deliver and works like a charm thanks.
customer_reviews.author: H Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Love it period just great
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a Logitech keyboard that was 8 years old. What a difference, 100% better and much easier to type on. I type while on the phone with clients and my old keyboard was loud on the clicks this one is quiet and touch is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the mouse is rechargeable, I just wish the same was true for the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: N. Voelpel

customer_reviews.title: Took it to work...
customer_reviews.text: Love having this set on my desk. Have always been a fan of ergonomic stuff in the workplace as it alleviates stress from extended periods in front of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good system for busy users
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this system when I started a new job. After using it a few months I bought this for my home PC, replacing a 1-yr-old Microsoft setup. The free-wheeling center wheel is awesome for word processing/text editing. You can easily change it to the normal detent mode on the go, too. The keyboard is quiet and responsive, with good layout of time-saving special keys. Pretty happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this wireless keyboard and the mouse. It is made well and very comfortable to use. It was very important for both the keyboard and the mouse to be ergonomically designed. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: WinnyHoney

customer_reviews.title: Jeff's review
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great value for the money spent. The extra 30 or 40 dollars over the regular wave will come back within 1 year on the saved batteries plus the added convenience of extended distance if you will be using this far from the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Keyboard and Mouse from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice keyboard and mouse for the money, the mouse is a little sensitive for my use, but still overall works very well. The keyboard is comfortable and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: readerof anything

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: I had owned the Microsoft Cordless 6000 v2 and mose. In fact it was my third one that died that led me to Logitech. The keyboard is a lot more comfortable than Microsoft's. The added keys make it easier to use Windows 7. Everything is about it is great. I only gave it a 4 in value for the price because I think that this technology should be a lot less costly. The mouse is fantastic. I have large hands and it fits very well. I let my wife try it out and she likes it too. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Boritz

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was claimed to work on MAC. Wrong. No drivers available. No support from Logitech. The mouse is not comfortable. Way too tall. A useless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Just Bob again

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Keyboard and Mouse
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard and mouse - need to have wireless at work and this is a really great product. My only minor negative remark would be that the mouse is almost TOO sensitive - but it is probably a setting I need to change and haven't gotten around to. Would highly recommend this product - and the price through Amazon was by far the best price I found!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic !
customer_reviews.text: This combination is really a wonderful upgrade, very smooth and easy to program as well as operate. The range and battery life also seems to be exceptional... Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Radford

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: The Keyboard is rather comfortable, and the mouse is fantastic. I'm actually writing this review as an excuse to use the keyboard more. It takes about a day or two to get used to the shape, but after that, it is surprisingly comfortable and I seem to be typing slightly faster. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Bulky But Great
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard combo but very bulky. Very durable and works great.
customer_reviews.author: David Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, this one for Wife
customer_reviews.text: I have had Wave Pro for about a year, love it. Bought this one for my wife. Battery life on the mouse every bit of 4-6 weeks. The range is easily 20' - 30'. Can't say anything bad about this product. I especially like the zoom, and scroll feature in the finger wheel on web pages. We have had several wireless key boards and mouse from Logitech and all are still working with relatives. You won't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: BEST OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: I have tested all microsoft keyboards and they are down right bad. I read the reviews on this and just got it in. This keyboard and mouse combo is the best out there right now. GREAT PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: M. Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, and a great value. The keyboard took a bit of getting used to - I kept hitting the wrong keys for a little while. But overall it was a good choice. The mouse is great. Nice and big, lots of adjustments can be made to the functionality, and best of all - cordless :)
customer_reviews.author: shrx2cup

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: Great combo for my computers. I have not figured the whole keyboard , yet. The size and feel are great.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I have this set for the office and the home. Works great and awesome not having the cords. The transmitter takes up a USB port but most PCs have plenty of them these days anyway. Comfortable shape and easy for typing.
customer_reviews.author: JDA

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wave Pro Set
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is fantastic. The keyboard takes some time to get use to since I was using a Microsoft natural keyboard for 8 years. The keys are a little closer together on the Wave Pro keyboard. I like the extra functions that you can perform on the keyboard. I highly recommend this setup.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Love Logitech!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've never had a wireless keyboard before and we love this one! The main reason for ordering this keyboard is because of the range. We have our computer hooked up to our TV, so now instead of having to sit or stand right in front of the TV we can sit back on our couch or chair and be able to be on the computer in comfort. Love the mouse, love the keyboard!! Love Logitech!
customer_reviews.author: brcasee

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this combo for office use and it exceded expectations. The Mouse is extremely confortable and reliable. I use it for design and the programable buttons work wonders. The keyboard is great too. The extra buttons and "shortcut keys" make life easier. A highly recommended product. I have not had any issues with connectivity and/or battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Duque

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing I've found with the set so far (it's only been a few days), the mouse lost contact with the USB receiver a few times for the first day or two. I have since figured out that it only happens when I put the keyboard between the receiver and the mouse. Just leave a clear path for the mouse and it should work great!
customer_reviews.author: Maestro PA

customer_reviews.title: Love the wave keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for work and liked it so much that I bought one for my home office as well. It seems to be a big improvement over my old BT set.
customer_reviews.author: JME

customer_reviews.title: Not Ergonomic, but "Comfort Designed"
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a perfectly fine product. Arrived on-time and in good condition, however, it is not ergonomic, it is "comfort designed" which is a much more subtle curvature and will not be enough of a change if you are trying to manage carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DiBernardo

customer_reviews.title: ... works after all this time and battery life is good.
customer_reviews.text: It still works after all this time and battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Wireless Keyboard and Mouse combo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on previous reviews and the reviews were helpful. Both the keyboard and mouse are comfortable and have all the extra functions that I need. The feedback from the keyboard is balanced, not too soft and not too "clicky". The mouse is rechargable and fits my hand nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Has alot of features and I like the white on black keys. Much easier to read.
customer_reviews.author: Deck Hand

customer_reviews.title: Wave of the future
customer_reviews.text: I'm not good at typing but this key board makes typing much easier for me. The wave design allows my hands to be in a much more natural position. I really like the key board and the rechargeable mouse is nice, maybe just a tad bit large. Overall I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rolen

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, well worth the price. I wish I'd bought this sooner. It does exactly what the advertisements claim and it looks great. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Shopper-lady

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great features on both keyboard and mouse, especially with Windows 7. I haven't had any problems with the wireless picking up. It's amazing the battery life lasts for a long time. Over all for the value for the money I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Simple plug and play. Ergonomic keyboard was easy to adapt to. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my husband B-Day, he was excited whe received his present this have everything that you needed and more, great product. I recomended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: nice keyboard / mouse stinks
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is very nice, soft yet firm keys however the mouse has got to be the worst mouse i have ever used. the mouse pointer stops for no reason. I purchased two of these one for my media center and one for my office. both of the mice stink. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Superuber

customer_reviews.title: Confotrable, easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product with my work laptop. I had it for about a month now and very happy with it. Another good product from Logitech
customer_reviews.author: Farouq A.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it advertises
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tactile feel. Very comfortable. I have had to charge the mouse, but not the key board. I have a HP Touchsmart so I would like to have had a Bluetooth to save a USB port, but the price was too good to pass up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dryer

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and works perfectly. Most important and why a customer would choose Wave over a comparable keyboard/mouse combo is the comfort offered by the Wave Pro. The ergonomics and comfort of the mouse and keyboard are unparalleled.
customer_reviews.author: P. French

customer_reviews.title: Great Combination
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do a lot of price shopping. I have two friends who have this combination and they like it. I'm happy with the purchase. The best thing about it...it's major easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: DON"T BUY THIS PICE OF CRAP!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this piece of rap gets a two star rating is that the muse is't too bad. However,the keyoard i joke. Ths is normal typing and about every fifth lettr skips. Makes it etemely hard to type psswords that are not sent in clear text. This thing is going in th garbage and I'm going back o my old $10 corded keyboard. It isn't the range as the keyboard is less than two eet from the USB thingy and has a lear line of sight. DON'T WATE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Retired World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: logitech wireless keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: the wireless function for both is great. I don't know about the battery life yet and the portability isn't a factor. it ist the full size keyboard and mouse over the keyboard on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell E. Graybill Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: After looking at replacing my mouse, I bought this combo for the same price they were selling the mouse itself for.The other thing that stands apart was the prompt shipping of the product. I had my mouse and keyboard 2 days after placing the order, Factory sealed as well.
customer_reviews.author: sherminator

customer_reviews.title: mac control panel dont work.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine on my MBP, but the software from logitec says "no logitech devices found" I've tried tons, but no answers yet. Product works fine tho.
customer_reviews.author: John Rezz

customer_reviews.title: amazing combo, by far best i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: amazing combo using with windows 7 and couldnt be happier. comfortable even when typing for long periods. mouse is incredible buttons are perfectly placed.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Ackermann

customer_reviews.title: nice cordless combo, but awkward for left handers
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cordless keyboard mouse combo, with a solid feel and a feature-rich mouse component. However, the left handed user is forced to contort one's hand to utilize the functions.
customer_reviews.author: farouche

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I would recommend this product to everyone who is looking for wireless keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Hsiao L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Keyboard. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my office at work. It is more than I had hoped for. Loaded with great and useful features. I would buy this product again and would certainly recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this several years ago. It is loaded with features, has a rechargable mouse battery that lasts forever and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Hamons

customer_reviews.title: Like the changes Logitech made
customer_reviews.text: Used previous versions of the same item. Logitech made positive changes in the mouse and intallation. This is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Rhubottom

customer_reviews.title: Logitech cordless ergonomic keyboard and mouse
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is comfortable and easy to use. Mouse does need recharging periodically, but my computer tells me when to do so. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam T.

customer_reviews.title: tim
customer_reviews.text: Software still want load, after calls to support was given a new link downloaded software from that link, installed the software same problem, all that comes up is part of the install screen, that was there answer. Gave up. also no indication that the caps are on or the number lock.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable, the wireless setup is great and the rechargeable battery on the mouse is wonderful. No complains! Will recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: HAPPYGOING63

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Ergo Keyboard and mouse. I like the rechargable aspect. The mouse already needs charging though after about a month or less of use. A little pricey but worth it...
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Desktop Wave Pro Review
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great product. Delivered ahead of time and was exactly what was described. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a wireless keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: John Parady

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable thing ever
customer_reviews.text: It may be large but its perfectly fitted for my hands and it is honestly quite comfortable. I really do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mithu Saha

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wireless keyboard/mouse with good range
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Good range at least 20 feet. cofortable to use and easy to install. no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: D. Nikitin

product_meta.title: Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro Keyboard and Laser Mouse (Black)
product_meta.description:
Logitech Cordless Desktop Wave Pro¿s acclaimed Wave keyboard design and the elegantly contoured mouse both conform to you naturally to provide our highest level of comfort. The three-year keyboard battery life and USB rechargeable mouse minimize the hassle of changing batteries. State-of-the-art laser technology, hyper-fast scrolling, and advanced 2.4 GHz wireless technology deliver exceptional precision and control.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Imagine a keyboard and mouse that actually conform to you, designed to cradle your hands and fingers with innovative new shapes for the ultimate in comfort. It's a luxury you won't find in any other keyboard and mouse. So get your hands on the Wave Pro, only from Logitech. 






Key Features Innovative Wave Design That Cradles Your Hands Naturally
A revolutionary advance in keyboard design, the acclaimed Wave Keyboard combines a wave-shaped contour, a curved layout, and a cushioned palm rest that all work together to help guide your hands into a more natural position for enhanced comfort.

Elegantly Contoured Mouse that Fits Comfortably in Your Hand
Designed to maximize comfort, the MX 1100 Cordless Laser Mouse features a contoured shape that fits your hand naturally and a soft rubber grip that provides added support and comfort.

Rechargeable Laser Mouse and 3-Year Keyboard Battery Life 
The high-performance laser mouse recharges easily with the included USB cable and lasts up to two months on a full charge. Advanced battery management technologies in your keyboard provide up to three years of operation on just two AA batteries (included).

Hyper-Fast Scrolling for Flying through Documents and Web Pages
The hyper-fast scroll wheel lets you fly through documents and Web pages in just seconds. One spin and you'll never go back to an ordinary scroll wheel.

See Other Logitech Hyper-Fast Scrolling Mice

Advanced 2.4 GHz Cordless Technology for More Robust, Reliable Performance
Logitech's new 2.4 GHz cordless wireless technology gives you more robust, more reliable performance than previous-generation technologies – with virtually no delays or drop-outs.

Superior Laser Precision for Smoother Tracking on Virtually Any Surface
Logitech's advanced laser technology works smoothly and effortlessly on virtually any surface, giving you a level of control many times more precise than an optical mouse.




One Spin, and You'll Never Go Back. Work faster, not harder. With hyper-fast scrolling, it's easy to be more productive – and more precise. The nearly frictionless alloy scroll wheel lets you fly through long documents and Web pages in just seconds. And you can switch back to “ratchet mode” for easily navigating lists or photos.

See Logitech's family of hyper-fast scrolling products here.

Logitech® MX™ Revolution Cordless Laser Mouse Logitech® VX Revolution™ Cordless Laser Mouse Logitech® VX Nano Cordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks Logitech® V550 Nano Cordless Laser Mouse for Notebooks Logitech MX™620 Cordless Laser Mouse Logitech Cordless Desktop® MX™5500 Revolution 


What's in the Box

Package Contents  * Logitech Cordless Wave Keyboard
 * Logitech MX 1100 Cordless Rechargeable Laser Mouse
 * USB mini-receiver;
 * USB to Micro USB charging cable
 * Desktop USB extension stand
 * 5V USB power adaptor
 * 2 AA alkaline batteries (pre-installed) 
 * 1 AA rechargeable NiMH battery (pre-installed) 
 * CD with software, comfort guidelines and help center;
 * Three-year limited hardware warranty
 * Quick-Start Guide

System Requirements  * PC with Windows XP or Windows Vista
 * CD-ROM drive
 * 1 available USB port
feature_bullets: Innovative Wave design that cradles your hands naturally
Elegantly contoured mouse that fits comfortably in your hand
Rechargeable laser mouse and 3-year keyboard battery life
Revolutionary hyper-fast scrolling for flying through documents and Web pages
Enhanced 2.4 GHz cordless technology for more robust, reliable performance
